Module: npc_ai

npc_ai

Non-player character add-on. Provides animated moves for NPC with specified behaviour.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 3

Methods

<static> disable_animation()

Removes all sensors attached to animated objects and stops animation
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 330

<static> enable_animation()

Attaches sensors to characters and runs elapsed_cb every frame.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 305

<static> npc_ai(graph)

Creates new event track based on given graph.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
graph Animation graph with a number of movement params.
Properties
Name Type Description
path A path wich npc will be moving around.
delay Time delay before each path step.
actions Actions for every move type (move, idle, etc).
obj Animated object.
collider Object collider for collision detection.
empty Corresponding empty object.
speed Movement speed.
random Determines whether object will perform random moves.
type Object movement type (walking, flying, etc).
rot_speed Rotation speed.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 38
